channel.title: Changing the "Choose Option" and Hitpoints bar
channel.description: Hey. How do I change the "Choose option" thing from... THIS: [img]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh98/frakismyname/chooseoption1.jpg?t=1281047255[/img] to THIS: [img]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh98/frakismyname/chooseoption2.jpg?t=1281047284[/img] ?!? And how do I change the Hitpoints bar from THIS: [img]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh98/frakismyname/hitpointsbar1.jpg?t=1281047878[/img] to THIS: [img]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh98/frakismyname/hitpointsbar2.jpg?t=1281047902[/img] ?!?! Thanks! :)

item.title: Changing the "Choose Option" and Hitpoints bar
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“Mr. Bobby, post:2, topic:361681”]http://tinyurl.com/27kp3dr

mess with tht cus idk[/quote]
All it gave me was errors that i fixed, and whenever i attacked any NPC or person, it would freeze my client, then log me out, with my client still frozen.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing the "Choose Option" and Hitpoints bar
